author.name: The Oregon URISA Young Professionals Group

entry.title: Welcome Young Professionals
entry.content:
Welcome, Young Professionals!

New website

Update your links! If you’re interested in contributing a blog post, please contact us.

Upcoming events

GIS in Action

Join us at GIS in Action, April 30th-May 1st at Portland State University. Scholarships available! There will also be workshops on April 29th and an unconference on May 2nd.

Spring Portland OpenStreetMap Edit-a-thon

The spring Portland OpenStreetMap Edit-a-thon will be taking place on April 20th at Lucky Lab Hawthorne.

State of the Map US

This year’s OpenStreetMap conference for the United States, State of the Map US is taking place June 8-9 in San Francisco. Scholarships are available for this too, and even include travel expenses!
